title: Microlearning-Based Inclusive Science Education Design for Administrators

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic scientific theories and managerial experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining asynchronous discussions and micro-content, enabling access to learning materials and participation via personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three core principles of inclusive leadership in science via microlearning modules within three days.
Learners can present two inclusive science education strategies that reflect peers' opinions in asynchronous discussions.
Learners achieve a 20% improvement in inclusive science communication skills scores in pre-post comparisons during final assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
